title: Fake Return Scams: Secure Your Crypto Investments
description:
A crypto investment scam called "rugpull bundles" where you simply invest an amount into an imported wallet address and get profits, the line "it's too good to be true" really slaps me in the face here, and I hope everyone can learn here.
